title.narrative: Printing, distribution and construction of textbooks storage facilities' component

description.narrative: This activity (Printing, distribution and construction of textbooks storage facilities' component) is a component of South Sudan Textbook Project reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,067,243. This component benefits South Sudan, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Charles Kendall Group, Mott MacDonald Limited. The start date is 06-07-2011 and the end date is 31-10-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
